gui.gendustrated_bees.gui.genome_extract: Missing Princess or Drone to extract from!
Any Valid Labware is required to extract Gene Samples!
gui.gendustrated_bees.gui.genetic_imprin: Missing Princess or Drone to Imprint Genes on!
A Complete Genetic Template Is required for Imprinting!
gendustrated_bees.jei.info.recycle: Unwanted Gene Samples and Genetic Templates can be "recycled" by smelting them in a furnace to get a blank one back.
gendustrated_bees.jei.info.add_gene_data: Put a Gene Sample with the Trait you want in the crafting grid with a Genetic Template to put that Trait on it.
gendustrated_bees.jei.info.genetic_impri:
The recipes for this block in JEI are just examples to show how it works. 
A Genetic Template CAN have any combinations of genes on it, not just the ones shown here!
gendustrated_bees.jei.info.genome_extrac:
The recipes for this block in JEI only show the default traits for each Bee Species. The Genes you get are entirely dependant on the Princesses/Drones you put in.
All Genes have a equal chance to be extracted!
